00027 class EffectTimeScale : public EffectSBSMS {
00028 
00029  public:
00030    EffectTimeScale();
00031 
00032    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00033       return wxString(_("Sliding Time Scale/Pitch Shift..."));
00034    }
00035 
00036    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00037      std::set<wxString> result;
00038      result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#PitchAndTempo"));
00039      return result;
00040    }
00041 
00042    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00043      return wxString(wxT("TimeScale"));
00044    }
00045 
00046    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00047      return wxString(_("Changing Tempo/Pitch"));
00048    }
00049    
00050    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00051    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00052 
00053    virtual bool Init();
00054 
00055    virtual bool PromptUser();
00056    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00057    virtual bool Process();
00058   
00059  private:
00060    double m_RateStart;
00061    double m_RateEnd;
00062    double m_HalfStepsStart;
00063    double m_HalfStepsEnd;
00064    bool m_PreAnalyze;
00065 
00066    friend class TimeScaleDialog;
00067 };
